name: Everlasting Leaf Pendant Necklace
description:
Jewelry Art~

Like a work of art, this pendant has been inspired by nature and it's beautiful shapes and colors. It is a second production of a "Leaf Me Be" pendant design I have made before. Constructed from Argentium Sterling Silver, hand forged, soldered and hammered into a leaf shape. I have used leaf shaped glass beads with bright greens and blues to add life and color to the pendant. The glass leaves are wrapped with sterling silver wire and fastened securely for lasting wear. 

Pendant measures 2 1/2" long x 1 6/16" wide. The Sterling chain and clasp measure 19" long but can be shortened or lengthened upon request.

***If you are interested in purchasing the pendant AS A SINGLE ITEM let me know and I can adjust the price accordingly***

This item is gift wrapped for no extra charge!

name: Ornate Hook Toggle
description:
An original!

Made from sterling silver, hand forged shapely pieces, soldered, smoothed and lightly hammered for detailing to make this bracelet a one-of-a-kind masterpiece. It's looping and filigree shaped designs are very different and add overall function as well as beauty to the bracelet's design. This piece has been shined and polished for maximum elegance. Makes a beautiful handmade gift!

Measures 8 3/16" of an inch in length from end to end. Fits medium - large size wrists, but it can be hooked in different ways to fit a smaller size wrist too. It's an adjustable size bracelet for all!

This item is gift wrapped for no extra charge!

name: Infinity Quartz Earrings
description:
Simple and Clean!

These earrings are manipulated into a looping "infinity" style shape and adorned with a shining piece of Smoke Quartz. This pair is made from Argentium Sterling silver and has been burnished for a lustrous shine. The Quartz has beautiful coloring with a clean cut surface. A great combo for any occasion!

Each earring measures 1 1/4" inches in length (from top to bottom) and 11/16" of an inch in width (the infinity loops)

Perfect size and easy to throw on!

This item is gift wrapped for no extra charge!

name: Sterling Shaker Ring
description:
Wearable Sculpture...

Hand formed Sterling Silver "salt shaker" inspired ring. Made from sterling silver sheet, soldered and shaped into it's round dimensional form. The holes in the top add a unique touch to the design and make it seem like a functional piece. A very different and funky-chunky ring to show off! 

This ring is size 6 1/4 (will fit between sizes 6-6.5) 
HOWEVER: I CAN remove the ring and resize it to what you want!!!

This item comes gift wrapped for no extra charge!! 

***I do not recomend you put salt or any other items in the ring for use - NOT FOOD SAFE***

name: Tribal Turquoise Necklace
description:
One Of A Kind!

This necklace has an exotic blend of natural Turquoise stones mixed in with teardrops of White Buffalo Turquoise. The mix of the two gives off an ancient tribal flair while combining the elements into todayâ€™s trends! Features a handmade Sterling hook clasp for easy fastening. A truly unique piece!

Measures 18 1/4" inches long (including clasp) 

Item is gift wrapped for no extra charge!
